#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
ll gcd(ll x, ll y){
    if(y==0) return x;
    else return gcd(y,x%y);
}
int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        ll x1,x2,y1,y2;
        cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
        ll ans=gcd(abs(x1-x2),abs(y1-y2))-1;
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
}
